name: Space Bar
description:
Space Bar is a sidescrolling shooter where you shoot down enemy aliens coming at you in random patterns! It's a Sharecart1000-compatible game created for the Teacart 1k Game Jam. Share your save file with other Sharecart1000 games to make Space Bar have a different first run of the game!

How to Play:

  • Movement: arrow keys
  • Shoot/Start game: space bar
  • Use bomb to clear screen: left shift
  • Enter name: type on the keyboard!
  • Confirm name: enter key

Updates:

  • 3/1/2015: Bombs have been added! Screen shakes when the player gets hit
  • 2/26/2015: Handled invalid save files, changed format of folders, music fix, player lives added
  • 2/25/2015 (10:30PM): Fixed game-breaking bugs
  • 2/25/2015: Boss added! ...Not much of a boss, though haha
  • 2/24/2015: Bigger enemies have been added! They take a few hits before going down.

Known Bugs:

  • None known, but if you find any problems, please let goofanader know!

Wishlist:

  • different Space Bar modes

Credits:

  • Art & Music: eyfey
  • Programming, Design, & SFX: goofanader
  • Framework: LÖVE2D
  • SFX Program: Bfxr
  • Libraries
    • anim8
    • middleclass
    • Hardon Collider
    • sharecart.lua

Source Code: https://github.com/goofanader/space-bar
